meeting_info.organization: Tax Increment Financing Reinvestment Zone Number Seven Board of Directors
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6DN Conference Room and Videoconference

presenters: Tamara Leak, Assistant Director (I), Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Call meeting to order and declare a quorum is established.
Nominate and elect a Temporary Chairperson.
agenda_items.description: Recommended action: Nominate and elect a Temporary Chairperson

agenda_items.title: Public comments pertaining to agenda items 5 through 8.
Nominate and elect a Vice Chairperson.
agenda_items.description: Recommended action: Nominate and elect a Vice Chairperson.

agenda_items.title: Review and consider the Meeting Record for the January 25, 2024 meeting.
agenda_items.presenter: Tamara Leak, Assistant Director (I), Office of Economic Development

agenda_items.title: Review and consider the Sports Arena TIF District Annual Report for Fiscal Year 2023-2024.
agenda_items.presenter: Tamara Leak, Assistant Director (I), Office of Economic Development
agenda_items.action_required: Approve and forward a recommendation of approval to City Council

agenda_items.title: Review and consider a quarterly regular meeting schedule for Sports Arena TIF District Board of Directors for calendar year 2025.
